statements: SELECT player_id, goals_scored, assists, yellow_cards FROM player_performance_metrics;
SELECT goals_scored, assists, yellow_cards, player_id FROM player_performance_metrics;
SELECT * FROM player_performance_metrics WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, goals_scored FROM player_performance_metrics WHERE assists > 5;
SELECT player_id, assists FROM player_performance_metrics WHERE yellow_cards < 2;
SELECT player_id, goals_scored, assists, yellow_cards FROM player_performance_metrics WHERE goals_scored > 5 ORDER BY player_id DESC
SELECT player_id, assists, goals_scored, yellow_cards FROM player_performance_metrics WHERE assists > 3 ORDER BY assists ASC, goals_scored DESC
SELECT player_id, goals_scored + assists AS total_points FROM player_performance_metrics WHERE yellow_cards < 2 ORDER BY total_points DESC
SELECT player_id, goals_scored, assists, yellow_cards FROM player_performance_metrics WHERE goals_scored >= 3 AND assists < 5 ORDER BY player_id ASC
SELECT player_id, goals_scored, yellow_cards FROM player_performance_metrics WHERE assists = 0 ORDER BY player_id DESC, goals_scored ASC
SELECT player_id, goals_scored, assists FROM player_stats WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT assists, goals_scored FROM player_stats WHERE assists > 3;
SELECT * FROM player_stats WHERE goals_scored >= 5 ORDER BY goals_scored DESC;
SELECT home_team, away_team, home_team_goals, away_team_goals FROM match_results WHERE match_id = 2;
SELECT home_team_goals, away_team_goals FROM match_results WHERE home_team = 'Barcelona';
SELECT player_id, goals_scored, assists FROM player_stats WHERE goals_scored > 5 ORDER BY goals_scored DESC;
SELECT away_team, home_team, away_team_goals, home_team_goals FROM match_results WHERE home_team = 'Barcelona' ORDER BY match_id ASC;
SELECT player_id, assists, yellow_cards FROM player_stats WHERE assists > 2 AND yellow_cards < 3 ORDER BY player_id;
SELECT home_team, away_team, home_team_goals, away_team_goals FROM match_results WHERE home_team_goals = away_team_goals ORDER BY home_team ASC, away_team DESC;
SELECT player_id, goals_scored + assists AS total_points FROM player_stats WHERE player_id % 2 = 0 ORDER BY total_points DESC;
SELECT player_id, goals_scored, assists, yellow_cards FROM player_performance_metrics;
SELECT player_id, player_name, team_id FROM player_details;
SELECT team_id, goals_conceded, matches_played FROM team_performance;
SELECT player_id, player_name, team_id FROM player_details WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, goals_scored, assists, yellow_cards FROM player_performance_metrics WHERE goals_scored > 10;
SELECT player_id, player_name, team_id FROM player_details WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, goals_scored, assists FROM player_details JOIN player_performance_metrics ON player_details.player_id = player_performance_metrics.player_id;
SELECT team_id, SUM(goals_conceded) AS total_goals_conceded FROM team_performance GROUP BY team_id;
SELECT player_name, goals_scored, assists, yellow_cards FROM player_performance_metrics JOIN player_details ON player_performance_metrics.player_id = player_details.player_id;
SELECT player_name, goals_scored, assists, yellow_cards FROM player_performance_metrics JOIN player_details ON player_performance_metrics.player_id = player_details.player_id WHERE goals_scored > 5;
SELECT * FROM player_metrics;
SELECT player_id, assists, goals_scored FROM player_metrics;
SELECT team_id, team_name FROM team;
SELECT * FROM match WHERE result='Win';
SELECT player_id, player_name, team_id, position FROM player WHERE team_id=2;
SELECT player_id, player_name, position FROM player WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, player_name, goals_scored FROM player_metrics WHERE goals_scored > 5 ORDER BY goals_scored DESC;
SELECT team_id, team_name FROM team WHERE team_name LIKE 'Bar%' ORDER BY team_name ASC;
SELECT match_id, team_id, opponent, date, result FROM match WHERE date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name, position, team_name FROM player JOIN team ON player.team_id = team.team_id WHERE team_name = 'Real Madrid';
SELECT player_name, goals_scored FROM players
SELECT team_name, COUNT(*) AS total_players FROM teams GROUP BY team_name
SELECT player_name, assists FROM players WHERE yellow_cards > 2
SELECT * FROM matches ORDER BY match_date DESC
SELECT player_name, goals_scored, assists FROM players WHERE assists > goals_scored
SELECT player_name, goals_scored, assists FROM players WHERE goals_scored > 10 ORDER BY assists DESC;
SELECT team_name, COUNT(player_teams.player_id) AS num_players FROM teams LEFT JOIN player_teams ON teams.team_id = player_teams.team_id GROUP BY team_name;
SELECT match_date, match_result FROM matches WHERE match_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY match_date ASC;

SELECT player_name, SUM(goals_scored) AS total_goals, SUM(assists) AS total_assists FROM player_stats JOIN players ON player_stats.player_id = players.player_id GROUP BY player_name HAVING total_goals >= 20;

SELECT team_name, AVG(goals_scored) AS avg_goals FROM teams JOIN player_teams ON teams.team_id = player_teams.team_id JOIN player_stats ON player_teams.player_id = player_stats.player_id GROUP BY team_name HAVING avg_goals > 2 ORDER BY avg_goals DESC;
